What if your child could receive, open, and read his or her own personal mail from God? Love Letters from God will invite them to do just that! With 18 of the most popular Bible stories, every story is accompanied by a special and encouraging letter, each tucked away in its own lift-the-flip envelope.Love Letters from God is the first book of the series written by Glenys Nellist.
